resources.string: Stopped debit orders
Select an account to view all your recent debit orders
Select an account
Select account
Recent debit orders
You have no stopped debit orders
You have no recent debit orders. Only debit orders from the last 40 days will be visible.
Select an account to view your recent stopped debit orders
Recent stopped debit orders
Company
Amount
Payment Date
Reference
Stop debit order
Reverse payment
Important information
Your stopped debit orders will appear in the stopped debit order list.
You can reverse a stopped debit order.
To permanently stop a debit order you need to cancel it with the service provider.
Remember a stopped debit order can adversely affect your credit rating.
Depending on your service provider, a stopped debit order instruction may not stop the debit order.
When you reverse a debit order payment you will not be able to stop the debit order until the next payment.
You can only reverse a single debit order payment at a time.
Unpaid debit orders could negatively affect your credit score.
If you suspect the debit order is fraudulent we recommend you stop the payment instruction before reversing it.
Once you reverse a payment it will disappear from your transaction list.
Reverse Payment
Reason for reversal
Select reason for reversal
Please select reason for reversal.
Please accept disclaimer
I hereby agree to take responsibility for any claim, whether by me or any other third party however it may arise, in regard to this payment being credited by Absa (or any other bank)
I did not authorise this debit order
The amount differs from the amount that I agreed to, or the amount was collected on the incorrect date
I have told the creditor to cancel the debit order
Debit order stopped
A stop order has been submitted for this debit order. Contact your service provider to stop this debit order permanently.
Debit order reversed
We have refunded R%s to your account.
Debit Orders
Call our Call Centre
This debit order exceeds the in-app debit order stop or reversal limit of %s. To stop or reverse this debit order, please email debitorder@absa.africa or visit your nearest branch.
